_xform_tuple(tup)¶
static change_basis(csSource, csTarget)¶

Changes the plane basis of an object. .. warning:: This method currently relies on access to the Rhinocommon Kernel. It will not work in other contexts. .. todo:: Re-implement this method without using the Rhinocommon Kernel.

param csSource:Plane source of the object.
type csSource:Plane
param csTarget:Target plane of the object.
type csTarget:Plane
result:Object with new Plane basis.
rtype:Geometry

static mirror(plane='world_xy')¶

Produces mirror transform. Can pass in “world_xy”, “world_yz”, or “world_xz”. Or, pass in an arbitrary cs (produces mirror about XYplane of CS)

Warning

When mirroring about an arbitrary plane, this method currently relies on access to the Rhinocommon Kernel. It will not work in other contexts.

Todo

Re-implement this method without using the Rhinocommon Kernel.

param plane:Plane to mirror the object with. Defaults to world XY plane.
type plane:Plane
result:Mirrored object.
rtype:Geometry
static rotation(**kargs)¶

Rotates an object around by center and rotation angle, or by a center, an axis and a rotation angle. .. warning:: This method currently relies on access to the Rhinocommon Kernel. It will not work in other contexts. .. todo:: Re-implement this method without using the Rhinocommon Kernel. .. todo:: Rotation about an axis ought to take in a linear entitiy, not a vector

param **kargs:Function that accepts multiple parameters to be passed. Parameters include center and axis of rotation and a rotation angle.
type **kargs:Point, Vec, float
result:Rotated object.
rtype:Geometry
static scale(factor, origin=None)¶

Scales an object by a given factor.

Parameters:factor (float) – Factor to scale by
Result :Scaled object.
Return type:Geometry
strip_translation()¶
static translation(vec)¶

Translates a geometry by a given Vector.

Parameters:vec (Vec) – Vector to apply a translation
Result :Translates an object
Return type:Geometry
